about_the_game:
The current version of the game, 1.7.0 contains the following:

- 9 Walkers (Npcs)

- 36 Items that you can buy and sell from walkers

- Hidden Seed Based Walker "Personality"

- 3 Save Files

- A randomized and pre-settable "SEED" system
- 1 Stock List

- 18 Hats for Walkers (Bought with in-game currency)
- 9 "Walker Coupons"
- 6 "Stat Trackers"

- 5 "Useables" (Additions to your shop)

Including:

- The Tip Bowl Kit

- The Incense Kit

- The Death Whistle

- The Coin Furnace Kit

- The Item "Display Stand"

Menu Settings:

- A "Dark Mode" Option

- 3 Volume Settings

- A "Hover Text" Option
Bonus Stuff:

- Hidden Easter Eggs

- A Day Summary

- A fully Original Soundtrack

- 30 In-Game Achievements (16 Hidden)

-Plus a few secrets and such I didn't mention...

What's the Goal? Survive...
Every 4 days are "collection days", where you have to pay rent to your shady landlord...
what happens if you don't make enough money?

You surrender and try again...

content_descriptors.notes:
Depictions of guns, theft, death, violence, gore.
Implications of child neglect and child abuse. 
All in a black and white cartoony style, there is little color.

This game does not support/condone gun violence and there are no paths in the game in which you're forced to use violence. It is up to the player's choice.

detailed_description:
The current version of the game, 1.7.0 contains the following:

- 9 Walkers (Npcs)

- 36 Items that you can buy and sell from walkers

What's the Goal? Survive...
Every 4 days are "collection days", where you have to pay rent to your shady landlord...
what happens if you don't make enough money?

You surrender and try again...
legal_notice:
The Kollectomaniac title and assets are the intellectual property of Akmac Industries. Owned and Created by Akmac, also known as Akmacdondon.
This game may contain flashing lights, jumpscares, and loud sound effects. Do not play this game if you suffer from any psychological disorder. Akmac Industries is not finically liable for any injuries related to Kollectomaniac or the Kollectomaniac Franchise. The Exception being references to games such as Minecraft, Hollow Knight, cuphead and other works which are not owned by Akmac, or Akmac Industries.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Pretty Much Anything
  • Processor: Pretty Much Anything
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Pretty Much Anything
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Beep borp beep boop
  • VR Support: None
  • Additional Notes: If you can't run it, something is wrong

  • Graphics: Really just anything

  • VR Support: Dum, da da dum da da dum! DAH DAH DAH DAH DAH DAH!
  • Additional Notes: If you can't run it, something is wrong

2000/-5 – Terabytes

“A strand type game like this would make kojima proud”
9/10 – Hobo

“I don't know how I got here”
1/100 – Akmac
short_description: A man offers you a job. Work at a log in the middle of the woods. Spend your money at the shop and improve your store. Don't stop collecting. Never miss collection day.  Sell to the nine walkers. Stay away from the computer game.
